title: Sea Festivals of Hong Kong
creator_contributor_role: Hong Kong Film Unit, production company

description: The sea between Hong Kong and neighbouring islands is the setting for many festivals and ceremonies in Southeast Asia. A beautifully photographed film on the junk and sampan dwellers, their life, fishing and in particular their colorful religious festivals.
